generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with lane markings extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There is a paved area on the right side of the road, separated by a curb and some railings, which is designated for pedestrians and is a sidewalk.
- building: A multi-story building with windows and balconies is visible on the left side of the road.
- vegetation: Numerous trees and green bushes are present along both sides of the road and in the background.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with a red border and blue background, indicating a no entry or no through traffic zone, is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one supporting the traffic sign and others along the sidewalk.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the left side of the road, and one car is visible driving in the distance.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the right side of the road, near the sidewalk.
